2. Mayor & City Council

Mayor & City Council
====================

The Midland City Council typically meets on the second and fourth Tuesday of every month
*with the exception of March, November & December. Council will meet once during these month*
s. Meetings begin at 10 a.m. in the Council Chamber located at City Hall (300 N. Loraine). Briefing sessions are generally held before the council meeting in the City Hall basement conference room.

City Council
------------

![COUNCIL GROUP PHOTO](https://www.midlandtexas.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=9741)



![Lori Blong](https://www.midlandtexas.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=7219)



Lori Blong
----------

### Mayor of Midland

[lblong@midlandtexas.gov](mailto:lblong@midlandtexas.gov)

Lori Blong is the Mayor of Midland, Texas, committed to fostering growth, economic development, and community well-being. As the first woman to serve in this role, she brings a strong background in business leadership and civic engagement to her work, aiming to enhance the quality of life for all Midland residents.

*Please note that Council Members do not have physical offices at City Hall*
